overview: Two Finnish PI:s are hunted by a gang specialized to counterfeit banknotes  from Malaga to Finland and Mallorca and back. The counterfeit money printing plates are desperately searched by the gang and our heroes try to hide from them by travelling to Mallorca, where some of the local hoods try to kill them and retake the missing plates.
title: Ei ruumiita makuuhuoneeseen
